https://openminds.om-i.org/props/descrip._instruction: Enter a short text describing this setup.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/descrip.description: Longer statement or account giving the characteristics of someone or something.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/descrip.label: Description
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/descrip.name: description

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/hasPart._instruction: Add all components, including other setups, that are part of this setup. Note that a setup should not be only composed of software.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/hasPart.label: Has part
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/hasPart.name: hasPart

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/locatio._instruction: Enter the geographic location of this setup. This may include room number, building, institution and/or city.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/locatio.label: Location
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/locatio.name: location

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/manufac._instruction: Add the manufacturer (private or industrial) that constructed this setup.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/manufac.label: Manufacturer
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/manufac.name: manufacturer

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/name._instruction: Enter a descriptive name for this setup.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/name.description: Word or phrase that constitutes the distinctive designation of a being or thing.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/name.label: Name
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/name.name: name

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/type._instruction: Add all types that describe this setup.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/type.description: Distinct class to which a group of entities or concepts with similar characteristics or attributes belong to.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/type.label: Type
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/type.name: type
